title: Roman villa at Maasbracht
description: A Roman villa near the modern village of Maasbracht, Limburg, Netherlands, famous for its murals. The earliest structures on the site are dated to the second century CE, and the villa was abandoned by the middle of the third century.

properties.description: Point representing the location of the Roman villa site near the village of Maasbracht.
properties.title: Geohack location of Roman villa at Maasbracht
